definitions.body: step, stair of temple Ez Eze 40:6 + 5 t. 40, and temple porch Eze 40:49; of altar Ex 20:26 (E) (forbidden, cf. RS:OTJC xii, n. l; 2nd ed. 358) Ez Eze 43:17 (prescribed); of house 2Ki 9:13, of throne 1Ki 10:19, 1Ki 10:20, 2Ch 9:18, 2Ch 9:19; to the city of David Ne 3:15, Ne 12:37.

. [[הַמַּעֲלוֹת]]([[ל]]) [[שִׁיר]] song of ascents, to the three great pilgrim feasts, i.e. to be sung on way up to Jerusalem, titles of Psalm Ps 120–Ps 134 + Ps 84:6 We al.—[[כְּתוֹר האדם המעלה]] 1Ch 17:17 is crpt., v. Comm.ad loc. (and on ‖ 2Sa 7:19).
